transcript: I'm embarrassing you. I didn't want to tell you this here. I wanted to drive some place brand new where we'd be brand new to each other. You feel it's wrong here, don't you?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'm embarrassing you.  I didn't want to tell you this here.  I wanted to drive someplace brand new where we'd be brand new to each other.  It feels wrong here don't you?
